00016 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00017  * File:         hchunks.h
00018  * Purpose:      Header file for Chunked elements
00019  * Dependencies: tbbt.c mcache.c
00020  * Invokes:      none
00021  * Contents:     Structures & definitions for chunked elements
00022  * Structure definitions: DIM_DEF, HCHUNK_DEF
00023  * Constant definitions:
00024  * Author: -GeorgeV -  9/3/96
00025  *---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00026 
00027 /* avoid re-inclusion */
00028 #ifndef __HCHUNKS_H
00029 #define __HCHUNKS_H
00030 
00031 #include "H4api_adpt.h"
00032 
00033 /* required includes */
00034 #include "hfile.h"  /* special info stuff */
00035 
00036 #ifdef   _HCHUNKS_MAIN_
00037 /* Private to 'hchunks.c' */
00038 
00039 #include "tbbt.h"   /* TBBT stuff */
00040 #include "mcache.h" /* caching routines */
00041 #include "hcomp.h"  /* For Compression */
00042 
00043 /* Define class, class version and name(partial) for chunk table i.e. Vdata */
00044 #if 0 /* moved definition of class of vdata to hlimits.h */
00045 #define _HDF_CHK_TBL_CLASS "_HDF_CHK_TBL_" /* 13 bytes */
00046 #define _HDF_CHK_TBL_CLASS_VER  0          /* zero version number for class */
00047 #endif /* moved definition of class of vdata to hlimits.h */ 
00048 #define _HDF_CHK_TBL_NAME  "_HDF_CHK_TBL_" /* 13 bytes */
00049 
00050 /* Define field name for each chunk record i.e. Vdata record */
00051 #define _HDF_CHK_FIELD_1   "origin"  /* 6 bytes */
00052 #define _HDF_CHK_FIELD_2   "chk_tag" /* 7 bytes */
00053 #define _HDF_CHK_FIELD_3   "chk_ref" /* 7 bytes */
00054 #define _HDF_CHK_FIELD_NAMES   "origin,chk_tag,chk_ref" /* 22 bytes */
00055 
00056 /* Define version number for chunked header format */
00057 #define _HDF_CHK_HDR_VER   0  /* zero version for format header */
00058 
00059 #endif /* _HCHUNKS_MAIN_ */
00060 
00061 /* Public structures */
00062 
00063 /* Structure for each Data array dimension Defintion */
00064 typedef struct dim_def_struct {
00065     int32 dim_length;          /* length of this dimension */
00066     int32 chunk_length;        /* chunk length along this dimension */
00067     int32 distrib_type;        /* Data distribution along this dimension */
00068 } DIM_DEF, * DIM_DEF_PTR;
00069 
00070 /* Structure for each Chunk Definition*/
00071 typedef struct hchunk_def_struct {
00072     int32    chunk_size;     /* size of this chunk*/
00073     int32    nt_size;        /* number type size i.e. size of data type */
00074     int32    num_dims;       /* number of actual dimensions */
00075     DIM_DEF *pdims;          /* ptr to array of dimension records for this chunk*/
00076     int32   chunk_flag;      /* multiply specialness? SPECIAL_COMP */
00077 
00078     /* For Compression info */
00079     comp_coder_t comp_type;     /* Compression type */
00080     comp_model_t model_type;    /* Compression model type */
00081     comp_info  *cinfo;        /* Compression info struct */
00082     model_info *minfo;        /* Compression model info struct */
00083 }HCHUNK_DEF, * HCHUNK_DEF_PTR;
00084 
00085 /* Private structues */
00086 #ifdef _HCHUNKS_MAIN_
00087 /* Private to 'hchunks.c' */
00088 
00089 /* Structure for each Data array dimension */
00090 typedef struct dim_rec_struct {
00091     /* fields stored in chunked header */
00092     int32 flag;                /* distrib_type(low 8 bits 0-7)
00093                                   - Data distribution along this dimension 
00094                                   other(medium low 8 bits 8-15)
00095                                   - regular/unlimited dimension? */
00096     int32 dim_length;          /* length of this dimension */
00097     int32 chunk_length;        /* chunk length along this dimension */
00098     
00099     /* info determined from 'flag' field */
00100     int32 distrib_type;        /* Data distribution along this dimension */
00101     int32 unlimited;           /* regular(0) or unlimited dimension(1) */
00102 
00103     /* computed fields */
00104     int32 last_chunk_length;   /* last chunk length along this dimension */
00105     int32 num_chunks;          /* i.e. "dim_length / chunk_length" */
00106 } DIM_REC, * DIM_REC_PTR;
00107 
00108 /* Structure for each Chunk */
00109 typedef struct chunk_rec_struct {
00110     int32 chunk_number;      /* chunk number from coordinates i.e. origin */
00111     int32 chk_vnum;          /* chunk vdata record number i.e. position in table*/
00112 
00113     /* chunk record fields stored in Vdata Table */
00114     int32  *origin;          /* origin -> position of chunk */
00115     uint16 chk_tag;          /* DFTAG_CHUNK or another Chunked element? */
00116     uint16 chk_ref;          /* reference number of this chunk */
00117 }CHUNK_REC, * CHUNK_REC_PTR;
00118 
00119 /* information on this special chunk data elt */
00120 typedef struct chunkinfo_t
00121 {
00122     intn        attached;     /* how many access records refer to this elt */
00123     int32       aid;          /* Access id of chunk table i.e. Vdata */
00124 
00125     /* chunked element format header  fields */
00126     int32       sp_tag_header_len; /* length of the special element header */
00127     uint8       version;      /* Version of this Chunked element */
00128     int32       flag;         /* flag for multiply specialness ...*/
00129     int32       length;       /* the actual length of the data elt */
00130     int32       chunk_size;   /* the logical size of the chunks */
00131     int32       nt_size;      /* number type size i.e. size of data type */
00132     uint16      chktbl_tag;   /* DFTAG_VH - Vdata header */
00133     uint16      chktbl_ref;   /* ref of the first chunk table structure(VDATA) */
00134     uint16      sp_tag;       /* For future use.. */
00135     uint16      sp_ref;       /* For future use.. */
00136     int32       ndims;        /* number of dimensions of chunk */
00137     DIM_REC     *ddims;       /* array of dimension records */
00138     int32       fill_val_len; /* fill value number of bytes */
00139     VOID        *fill_val;    /* fill value */
00140     /* For each specialness, only one for now SPECIAL_COMP */
00141     int32       comp_sp_tag_head_len; /* Compression header length */
00142     VOID        *comp_sp_tag_header;  /* compression header */
00143 
00144     /* For Compression info */
00145     comp_coder_t comp_type;            /* Compression type */
00146     comp_model_t model_type;           /* Compression model type */
00147     comp_info   *cinfo;               /* Compression info struct */
00148     model_info  *minfo;               /* Compression model info struct */
00149 
00150     /* additional memory resident data structures to be used */
00151     int32       *seek_chunk_indices; /* chunk array indicies relative
00152                                         to the other chunks */
00153     int32       *seek_pos_chunk;     /* postion within the current chunk */
00154     int32       *seek_user_indices;  /* user postion within the element  */
00155     TBBT_TREE   *chk_tree;    /* TBBT tree of all accessed table entries 
00156                                  i.e. CHUNK_REC's read/written/modified */
00157     MCACHE      *chk_cache;   /* chunk cache */
00158     int32       num_recs;     /* number of Table(Vdata) records */
00159 }
00160 chunkinfo_t;
00161 #endif /* _HCHUNKS_MAIN_ */

00174         (int32 file_id,       /* IN: file to put linked chunk element in */
00175          uint16 tag,          /* IN: tag of element */
00176          uint16 ref,          /* IN: ref of element */
00177          uint8 nlevels,       /* IN: number of levels of chunks */
00178          int32 fill_val_len,  /* IN: fill value length in bytes */
00179          VOID  *fill_val,     /* IN: fill value */
00180          HCHUNK_DEF *chk_array /* IN: structure describing chunk distribution
00181                                  can be an array? but we only handle 1 level */);
00182

00184         (accrec_t* access_rec,    /* IN: access record */

00187

00189         (int32 access_id,         /* IN: access record */

00193         (int32 file_id,    /* IN: file in which element is located */
00194          uint16 data_tag,

00196      int32 *chk_coord, /* IN: chunk coord array or NULL for non-chunk SDS */
00197          uintn start_block,/* IN: data block to start at, 0 base */
00198          uintn info_count, /* IN: size of offset/length lists */
00199          int32 *offsetarray,     /* OUT: array to hold offsets */
00200          int32 *lengtharray);    /* OUT: array to hold lengths */
00201 
00202     HDFLIBAPI intn HMCgetdatasize
00203         (int32 file_id,    /* IN: file in which element is located */
00204          uint8 *p,         /* IN: buffer of special info header */
00205          int32 *comp_size, /* OUT: size of compressed data */
00206          int32 *orig_size  /* OUT: size of non-compressed data */);
00207 
00208     HDFLIBAPI int32 HMCsetMaxcache
00209         (int32 access_id,  /* IN: access aid to mess with */
00210          int32 maxcache,   /* IN: max number of pages to cache */
00211          int32 flags       /* IN: flags = 0, HMC_PAGEALL */);
00212 
00213     HDFLIBAPI int32 HMCwriteChunk
00214         (int32 access_id,  /* IN: access aid to mess with */
00215          int32 *origin,    /* IN: origin of chunk to write */
00216          const VOID *datap /* IN: buffer for data */);
00217 
00218     HDFLIBAPI int32 HMCreadChunk
00219         (int32 access_id,  /* IN: access aid to mess with */
00220          int32 *origin,    /* IN: origin of chunk to read */
00221          VOID *datap       /* IN: buffer for data */);
00222 
00223     HDFLIBAPI int32 HMCPcloseAID
00224         (accrec_t *access_rec /* IN:  access record of file to close */);
00225

00227         (accrec_t * access_rec, /* IN:  access record to return info about */
00228          int32 *num_recs        /* OUT: length of the chunked elt */);

00277 
00278     extern int32 HMCPinquire
00279         (accrec_t * access_rec, /* IN:  access record to return info about */
00280          int32 *pfile_id,       /* OUT: file ID; */
00281          uint16 *ptag,          /* OUT: tag of info record; */
00282          uint16 *pref,          /* OUT: ref of info record; */
00283          int32 *plength,        /* OUT: length of element; */
00284          int32 *poffset,        /* OUT: offset of element -- meaningless */
00285          int32 *pposn,          /* OUT: current position in element; */
00286          int16 *paccess,        /* OUT: access mode; */

00297 extern funclist_t chunked_funcs;  /* functions to perform chunking */
00298 
00299 #else /* in hchunks.c */
00300 
00301 /* the accessing special function table for chunks */
00302 funclist_t  chunked_funcs =
00303 {
00304     HMCPstread,
00305     HMCPstwrite,
00306     HMCPseek,
00307     HMCPinquire,
00308     HMCPread,
00309     HMCPwrite,
